document.full_text: american international group and the treasury said they will sell around $9 billion in aig stock, suggesting the government's exit from its crisis-era investment will be slower and less profitable than originally thought.
document.title: aig sets $9 billion stock offer, less than expected
lines_and_colors: american international group and the treasury said they will sell around $9 billion in aig stock, suggesting the government's exit from its crisis-era investment will be slower and less profitable than originally thought.
